participant_1.background:
I loved reading books as a child, and I would often spend hours in my room, lost in a world of my imagination.
I like to watch thrillers because they keep me on the edge of my seat.
i help my neighbor.
I love to travel and explore, but I always make sure to spend time with my family, too.
i read sci fi space adventures with a passion.

I used to enjoy playing sports, but my back pain has made it too difficult.
i was born male and transitioned to female when i was 17.
i love riding roller coasters.
i love iced tea.

content.text: Yes, I love to read! What kinds of books do you like?
I love science fiction and space adventures.
That's awesome! I love sci-fi too. What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is Ender's Game. I love the way it explores the themes of war and peace.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a really good read. Do you have any favorite authors?
I love Orson Scott Card. He's one of my favorite authors.
Me too! He's a great writer. What's your favorite book by him?
I think my favorite book by him is Ender's Game. I also really like the Ender's Shadow series.
Those are both great books! I've read them both multiple times.
Me too! I love the way they explore the themes of war and peace.
I agree. They're really thought-provoking books.
